mapper.select: select b.Id as 'OrderId',b.Place,d.GuideTel as 'Tel',a.LineName,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23)OutDate,b.AllNumber, b.AdultNumber,b.BabyNumber,b.OldNumber,b.ChildNumber,b.ContactName,b.ContactTel, a.GuideName from OrderSubstitut a join OrderDetailed b on a.Id = b.OrderSubstitutId join Orders d on d.Id = b.OrderId where a.ToGuideId = #{Id} and b.Statu = 1 order by a.OutDate desc

update OrderDetailed set Statu=3 where Statu=1 and Id = #{id}
mapper.select: select u.GuideTel as 'guideTel',a.LineName as 'lineName',a.ToGuideId as 'guestId',b.Statu as 'Status', convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23)outDate,b.AllNumber,b.ContactName,b.ContactTel,u.GuideName as 'guestName', b.AdultNumber,b.BabyNumber,b.OldNumber,b.ChildNumber,b.Place from OrderSubstitut a left join OrderDetailed b on a.Id = b.OrderSubstitutId join Orders u on b.OrderId = u.Id where a.CreateUserId=#{Id} order by a.OutDate desc
